long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start recording anywhere on the web with Tella for Chrome. You can record your screen, camera, or both at the same time.

Tella is your all-in-one screen recorder. Create demos, online courses, 1:1s for customers, promote your project on social media, and more.

KEY FEATURES
üìΩÔ∏è Record your screen and/or camera in 2-clicks
üì∫ Add multiple clips in the same video
üíæ Automatically save videos online 
üîó Share them with 1-click
üåÅ Add stunning backgrounds
‚úÇÔ∏è Trim, split crop anything in your videos
üîç Add zoom effects 
üñºÔ∏è Use multiple camera layouts
üî° Add automatic and editable subtitles
ü™ü Use landscape or portrait mode
üåí and many more!

WHY TELLA
üíª Simple
‚ö° Fast
üîã Powerful 
ü¶ã Beautiful

FOR MAC USERS
Tella also has a native screen video recorder for Mac. It's packed with powerful features so your quick videos become great content.

FOR CREATORS
Creators everywhere use Tella to delight their viewers. Here‚Äôs how you can too. Record sleek demo videos of your products. Tella makes it easy to re-record, trim, and edit your clips, so you‚Äôre confident it will drive impact. Deliver polished recordings that impress your students. Tella makes it easy for your students to follow along with your course materials by recording your slides and your webcam. Make clear and simple step-by-step tutorials with Tella wwebcam recorder. You can start webcam recording in just two clicks, so you don‚Äôt have to fuss with a bunch of tools.

FOR FOUNDERS
Founders use Tella screen video recording to keep in touch with their teams and share updates without sending lengthy emails. Here‚Äôs how founders use Tella. When you‚Äôre ready to launch your new venture or share a release, use Tella to record yourself and your screen so you can walk through a presentation or website. Tella makes it easy to edit the recordings, so the final product is succinct and professional. Deliver polished product demos that impress prospects and compel them to buy. Share your screen to show presentation slides or walk prospects through your product. It‚Äôs easy to record clips and arrange them the way you want afterwards so that your product demos are focused and only show the most important parts.Founders can make their sales videos more engaging than a simple video conference call recording. Edit your capture video to remove any long loading screens, meandering explanations, or slip-ups. With Tella, you can be confident your sales videos will deliver results.

FOR STARTUPS
Startup teams use Tella screen video record to keep each other in the loop asynchronously. Here are three ways startups use Tella every day. Knowledge sharing in a remote workplace is hard. With Tella, it‚Äôs easy. Team members can record their screens to outline how to do tasks and quickly share the recordings with their team. If you‚Äôre building a knowledge hub, it‚Äôs easy to export the videos, generate and embed code, or get a link. Deliver polished product demos that impress prospects and compel them to buy or invest. Share your screen to show presentation slides or walk prospects through your product. It‚Äôs easy to record clips and arrange them the way you want afterwards so that your product demos are focused and only show the most important parts. Startups can keep teams up to date by sending quick video messages and sharing their screens to show what they‚Äôre working on. Rather than lengthy emails, Tella makes it easy to send quick updates.

FOR COURSE CREATORS
Course creators use Tella to share their knowledge with their viewers. Here‚Äôs how you can too. You can start recording in just two clicks, so you don‚Äôt need so many tools. You can start delivering value immediately and share your enthusiasm for your new course. Tella makes it easy to record your screen and your webcam with different layouts and backgrounds so you can make a course video that fits your brand. Deliver polished promo videos for your course that impress students and compel them to join. Share your screen to show presentation slides of your upcoming course, so prospective students know what they‚Äôll get inside. Introduce students to your community with a professional onboarding video that gets them excited to begin learning. You can walk them through what they‚Äôll find in the community and how to navigate it with Tella camera recording app. You can still download and upload your videos across any video-hosting and course-creation platforms.

FOR INTERNAL COMMS
Teams can use Tella to keep each other updated, share reports, diagnose bugs, make demo videos, tutorials, and more. Rather than sending another email or typing out a message, send a quick Tella video to get your message across. You can start recording in just two clicks, so you don‚Äôt need any additional tools. Tella makes it easy to record your screen and your webcam so sharing updates on product changes, bugs, or feature edits is seamless. Don‚Äôt get bogged down in emails. With Tella, startups can share weekly updates without lengthy reporting and emails. Simply start recording your webcam and screen, explaining what you‚Äôre doing this week or on this project and send it off. Team members can watch it at 2X speed to keep up to date faster. Put employee learning on the fast track by recording tutorials or how-to videos for your knowledge hub. Tella‚Äôs editor makes it easy to remove any mistakes, so every video delivers only the essential information.

FOR PRODUCT TEAMS
Product teams use Tella to share demos, communicate internally and provide feedback. Startups use Tella to share company and team updates asynchronously. Rather than writing out lengthy emails, fast-moving teams jump into Tella, quickly record their messages and send them off to team members without any hassle. Remote team members connect over video using Tella‚Äôs screen recording to share their screen and webcam easily. It‚Äôs quicker than other video conferencing tools and is easy to share recordings instantly. Learning and development programs use Tella to create course content and training videos. Rather than wasting time and money on recording equipment and sets, experts and employees can quickly record content using Tella and upload it to their company‚Äôs knowledge base.

FOR LEARNING AND DEVELOPMENT
L&D teams use Tella to make tutorials, share knowledge internally and record online events. Sales teams use Tella to record training sessions and share them with other team members. With Tella, it‚Äôs easy to coach team members on critical sales skills like how they handle objections. Tella also enables asynchronous communication, so key tasks like how to keep the CRM up to date are followed correctly every time. Product teams use Tella to share design walk-throughs and make bug reports. Rather than lengthy docs and email chains, Tella speeds up communication and makes it easier to provide full context. Course creators use Tella to make professional and clear course videos without needing to be an expert in video editing. It‚Äôs easy to record multiple clips and stitch them together, so the final product is exactly the way they intended.

FOR ONLINE COMMUNITIES
Online communities use Tella to collaborate and connect with one another authentically through video. Course creators use Tella to make engaging video content and presentations that viewers actually want to watch. With Tella, course creators are making professional videos without a degree in videography. Share what you‚Äôre working on and invite your audience to follow along with your journey by keeping them up to date on what you‚Äôre working on. Make online events more collaborative by networking with others through pre-recorded videos made on Tella. It takes only a couple of clicks to record a video and share it. Teachers can pre-record their lessons and edit them using Tella‚Äôs easy-to-understand editor. Capture screen, trim, cut, and rearrange clips to make their final lessons concise and clear. 

FOR SALES
Find new leads and convert them into opportunities with prospecting videos made with Tella. Use animated GIF thumbnails in emails and call-to-action buttons on the video to make them more effective. Make your customer's life easier by walking them through the proposal with a video. They can easily share the video with other stakeholders so every one is on the same page. Get new customers quickly up to speed with onboarding videos. Record training videos and product demos that will start with your product successfully. Record webcam, screen capture, video capture with Tella.

With two clicks you can start recording a video anywhere on the web with your Tella camera recorder. Recordings are saved to your Tella account in real-time. 

Tella for Chrome lets you record multiple clips in one go. Making it quick and easy to create dynamic videos with different shots.

Open the Tella web app to edit your video. Add backgrounds, change layouts, or record more clips.

Share your video instantly, just copy the link and send it to viewers. Or download your video as an mp4 file so that you can publish to YouTube, Vimeo, and other platforms.

Use Tella to record screen and videos for demos, tutorials, presentations, and updates. So whether you're launching a new product, making the most of remote work, or just want a fun way to record video, Tella for Chrome has you covered.

Tella comes in two plans: Starter and Pro. Starter has everything you need to record great videos. Or go unlimited and upgrade to Tella Pro to record as many videos as you want.
